Title.Language: Introduction to the Coptic Pauline Epistle

Comment.Language: The epistle is chanted in Coptic, half of it in the Paschal tune and the other half in the standard tune, followed by "The Grace of Our Lord (Pih~mot gar)," then it is translated.

Text.Language: Matoube pisem/r n~a~pac e~bolqen y/nou: hina n~tetenswpi n~ouwsem m~beri...
Therefore purge out the old leaven, that you may be a new lump...

Title.Language: Introduction to the Coptic Pauline Epistle

Comment.Language: The epistle is chanted in Coptic, half of it in the Paschal tune and the other half in the standard tune, followed by "The Grace of Our Lord (Pih~mot gar)," then it is translated.

Text.Language: }tamo de m~mwten nac~n/ou e~pieuaggelion v/etauhisennoufi m~mof nwten...
Moreover, brethren, I declare to you the gospel which I preached to you...

Title.Language: Introduction to the Coptic Pauline Epistle

Comment.Language: If the Pauline Epistle is read in Coptic, the following introduction is chanted.
